subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
i.National capacity for MDG based development strategy development; capacity for economic and financial management and MDG reporting strengthened.
ii. National MDG Accelarated Action Plan developed.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: MDG Based Planning and Monitor

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
